overview: Angel Emily & Mary Kalisy have decided to have a beach volleyball game. The girls keep up their efforts until Renato declares a tie. They go to each other for a high five and a kiss, then walk hand in hand to join Renato where he's lounging in the shade. Veronica Clark & Charlie Red are enjoying some girl time trying to find the perfect outfit. As they dress and undress, they find themselves more interested in locking lips than in outfits. When Michael finds them, the girls decide the more the merrier. Abella Danger has found someone to bring home to her boyfriend. Avi Love can't wait to take part in a threesome between herself, Abella, and Alex. Alex is waiting for Ember Stone when her roommate, Alexa Grace, decides to take this opportunity to act on her attraction. The pair are almost caught by Ember but this is just the beginning of a sexy tale that turns out to be the most fun this trio has ever had.
title: Her First Threesome
